entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
